page.title: 10Thorney Clubs and Societies
page.content: In{Thorney}there is a wide range of entertainment covering all age groups from the young to the very old.The {Bedford Hall,Social Centre}and{Duke of {Bedford School}are where most of the entertainment is held. Some of the things happening are as follows: {Mondays_Youth Club. {Tuesdays_Guides,Brownies,Army Cadets, {Keep_fit,}and{Slimnastics. {Wednesdays_Christian Life Fellowship, {Thorney Wives,}and{Saldance School of {Dancing. {Thursdays_Over 60's. {Fridays_Scouts}and{Cubs. {Sundays_Sunday School}and{Discoverers. {Badminton}play most nights.Most groups during the year hold Jumble Sales, Bingo, and Fashion Shows, for all to enjoy. The{school gala}is an annual event where all can take part in floats, processions and fancy_dress.
